name: Buffy The Vampire Slayer Stake Ask
description: I was looking through Buffy on here to see the selection is very limited, So I made one of Buffy's stakes into an 'ask'. :)

user.name: AugustRainn
user.about:
If you'd like a request, You can visit my Tumblr, ' www.theaugustrainnpreferences.tumblr.com ' Or you can send an email. :)

If you have any problems with any of the styles, Don't be afraid to say something so I can fix them! xx

additional_info: I've tested this style on both firefox and Chrome, And this style works best with firefox. :)
